Articles.Content:
Hi quick 2 questions:

1) I cannot seem to dock with 2 senior clamp-o-trons - is this even possible?

2) Is there a way to terminate all debris at once? cause its a pain in the arse to delete them one-by-one.

Thank you

1) Yes, definitely possible, and in fact the only thing they will dock with in the stock game is each other. Are you sure one of them isn't turned the wrong way around in assembly? Easy mistake to make, both sides look very similar. The default orientation assumes you're putting the port at the top of the ship, if putting at the bottom you need to flip it over.

2) Go into Settings and turn the debris slider all the way to zero, no more debris. Turn it back up after if you want debris back.
Great! thanks, I think I have tried both ways, but wont hurt to try it again.
